about_the_game:
Select a flagship and embark on a journey across a universe on the brink of annihilation. Construct your deck of ships and science, obtain powerful artifacts to enhance your strategy, and make tough choices for the good of the galaxy. Warp across sectors, battle hostile factions, and face impossible odds as the universe itself collapses around you.

In Ace of Space you take the roll of Flagship Commander on a desperate mission to save the galaxy from an all-consuming cosmic entity. With each sector you enter, you’ll encounter distinct factions, from the ruthless Sovereign Imperium to the elusive Venom Syndicate and the nature-bound Verdant Dominion. The stakes are high, and every choice you make could be your last.

But there’s more than just war—time and space are unraveling, and an ancient, unstoppable force is at the heart of it all. Will you attain the strength and synergies needed to stop the Oblivion Nexus, or will you and your crew be lost to the void?

Wishlist today. Updates are coming at a rapid pace.

Features:

  • Dynamic Tactical Combat: Engage in strategic, real-time battles with enemies from across the galaxy. Adapt to each faction’s unique strengths and weaknesses.

  • Factions with Rich Lore: Each sector is controlled by a distinct faction with their own agendas, strengths, and hostilities. Fight, trade, or forge alliances with the Ironclad Cartel, Stormfront Collective, and more.

  • Cosmic Mystery Unfolding: Explore a universe in chaos, as an entity from beyond space and time slowly consumes everything. Each sector brings new challenges, from navigating frozen wastelands of the Frostspire League to surviving the brutal zealots of the Eternal Pantheon.

  • High-Stakes Story: Your decisions matter. Protect your crew, manage resources, and make critical choices that will decide the fate of your ship—and the galaxy.

  • 16 unique Ships

  • 34 Cards

  • 8 different Factions to encounter and play as

  • 11 events

Features Planned:

  • Artifacts

  • Weather

  • Backgrounds

  • Lots and lots more content

  • Shop

  • Bossfights

  • Music

  • Unlockables

  • Much more to be announced

The universe is crumbling, and only you stand between survival and total annihilation. Are you ready to face the unknown?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS or similar
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible, integrated graphics (Intel HD 3000 or similar)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 (El Capitan)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
